GK16udkass_u:2445: yatra ca vācyasyāvavakṣā pūrvamuktā “rāmo 'smī'ti 'suvarṇapuṣpā'miti ca tatra vayamadhikāropetaprastutārthānubandhivastūpanibandhādaprastutapraśaṃsābhedatvameva nyāyyaṃ manyāmahe /
